Factor: Motivation to Teach Science (influences attainment value, intrinsic value, utility value, and cost)
Barrier to participation: I was not interested in the subject. I do not know enough about climate change. Climate change is too controversial.

Factor: Program Features and Prior PD Experiences (influences intrinsic value, utility value, cost)
Barrier to participation: I do not have time to teach this curriculum. I do not have time to attend the PD. I am already familiar with the content.

Factor: Social Support (influences attainment value, intrinsic value, and cost)
Barrier to participation: I do not have parental support.

Factor: Administration Support (influences attainment value, utility value, and cost)
Barrier to participation: I do not have administrative support.
